statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ -5 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ 7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
